title: The Borgia Prince
description: Fiona Palin enjoys her new job in the box office of Schenectady's regional theatre: the comings and goings of cast, crew, and public are a play in themselves. She doesn't expect a murder on the opening night of the theatre's new play, "The Borgia Prince," or that her curiosity will lead to a dangerous confrontation with the killer.
author: Winifred Elze
